profile.headline: MERN | NEXT | AWS | FLUTTER
profile.summary: I'm a Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience, I contribute to both web and mobile development teams. My expertise spans frontend technologies including React, Next.js, Redux, and Flutter with BLoC architecture, alongside backend development using Node.js, MongoDB, Socket.io, and Python. I've solved complex real-world challenges involving WebSockets, real-time communication, deep linking, webhooks, and notification routing systems. Additionally, I have strong experience in cloud infrastructure and DevOps, working with AWS services (EC2, ECS, ECR, S3, CodePipeline) and implementing Infrastructure as Code using Terraform for deploying dockerized applications. Currently, I'm actively contributing to Healo, A Mental Health AI Chatbot.

highlights: Engineered scalable full-stack web applications using the MERN stack, ensuring high availability and performance.
Implemented containerization strategies using Docker and managed cloud deployments on AWS services (EC2, S3).
Spearheading the development of the ’HealoAI’ mobile application using Flutter and Bloc architecture, focusing on clean state management and responsive UI implementation.
Collaborated with a team of 5 developers to deliver 3 robust full-stack web applications for clients.
Optimized frontend performance and backend latency, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.
Translated client requirements into technical specifications and delivered features within strict deadlines.

projects.name: Summarizer-CLI
projects.description: Developed an npm CLI tool utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs) to instantly summarize code files, functions, and custom prompts directly from the terminal.
highlights: Integrated features such as automatic function extraction, syntax highlighting, and multiple export formats to streamline developer code reviews and documentation.

projects.name: Video Conferencing Platform
projects.description: Built a real-time video conferencing application featuring secure user authentication via Clerk and high-quality video transmission using Stream SDK.
highlights: Designed an intuitive interface with meeting controls and room management, ensuring low-latency communication.

projects.name: Document Management System
projects.description: Architected an efficient document management platform with categorized sidebars, powerful search functionality, and real-time collaboration tools.
highlights: Implemented role-based security and seamless document updates to enhance team productivity.

education.school: Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering
education.degree: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

education.school: Sheth G.H High School and Junior College
